body_html:
Couple of things I would like to check. I see that you are using Python 3.X
Therefore you need to use pip3 to install TensorFlow and Keras
pip3 install tensorflow
pip3 install keras
Also are you able to start a TensorFlow session successfully?
What's the output of following in your python console?
import tensorflow as tf

body:
Couple of things I would like to check. I see that you are using Python 3.X
Therefore you need to use pip3 to install TensorFlow and Keras
pip3 install tensorflow
pip3 install keras
Also are you able to start a TensorFlow session successfully?
What's the output of following in your python console?
  import tensorflow as tf
